amendment.description: To provide that prescription drug benefits for any Member of Congress who is enrolled in a health benefits plan under chapter 89 of title 5, United States Code, may not exceed the level of prescription drug benefits passed in the 1st session of the 108th Congress, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 957 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 3. Record Vote Number: 237.

action.text: Amendment SA 957 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S8348; text: CR S8348) To provide that prescription drug benefits for any Member of Congress who is enrolled in a health benefits plan under chapter 89 of title 5, United States Code, may not exceed the level of prescription drug benefits passed in the 1st session of the 108th Congress, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 957 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 3. Record Vote Number: 237.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 957 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 3. Record Vote Number: 237.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 957 proposed by Senator Dayton.
